channel.title: [PI] Adding Dungeoneering Monsters
channel.description:
Hello people of moparscape
I downloaded this pack of dungoeneering monsters the other day from this thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=436298.0
Im wondering if any one knows how to convert the ints to make it work with a PI client?
Im also wondering were i put all these ints and the .dat files for the mobs?
If someone could please help me out i would be very great full :D Thanks you
